reviewText: This DVD is a rip off of the artist. Very Very poor VHS quality video copied to DVD from German broadcast TV, watch for FREE on U tube. Packaging is deceiving look like high quality DVD. Audio is up-sample and processed mono formatted in 5.1.  SHAME SHAME SHAME. Broadcast TV can not copyrighted  by some one who recorded a live broadcast. This is a review of the product not the seller!  Supporting ripoff copiers is worst then ILLEGAL DOWN LOADING!
